languages.text: "Наверное, Мастер дисциплины помнит, как в былые годы Белинда числилась лучшим стрелком среди блюстителей. И знает, что с годами мои глаза и рука не стали хуже. Я провела на посту сорок лет и до сих пор по походке могу определить, тащит ли человек в карманах запрещенку".

traits.locale_text: "Наверное, Мастер дисциплины помнит, как в былые годы Белинда числилась лучшим стрелком среди блюстителей. И знает, что с годами мои глаза и рука не стали хуже. Я провела на посту сорок лет и до сих пор по походке могу определить, тащит ли человек в карманах запрещенку".

languages.text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."
languages.original_text: "Наверное, Мастер дисциплины помнит, как в былые годы Белинда числилась лучшим стрелком среди блюстителей. И знает, что с годами мои глаза и рука не стали хуже. Я провела на посту сорок лет и до сих пор по походке могу определить, тащит ли человек в карманах запрещенку".

traits.locale_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day. And knows that my eye and hand have not gotten worse over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and I can still tell by the way a man walks if he is carrying contraband up his pockets."

"I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day. And knows that my eye and hand have not gotten worse over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and I can still tell by the way a man walks if he is carrying contraband up his pockets."

"I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

"I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

"I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

"I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, der Waffenmeister erinnert sich, dass Belinda damals die beste Schützin der Enforcer war, und er weiß, dass mein Auge und meine Hände über die Jahre nicht nachgelassen haben. Ich kann nach vierzig Dienstjahren bis heute am Gang erkennen, ob jemand Schmuggelware in den Taschen hat."
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, der Waffenmeister erinnert sich, dass Belinda damals die beste Schützin der Enforcer war, und er weiß, dass mein Auge und meine Hände über die Jahre nicht nachgelassen haben. Ich kann nach vierzig Dienstjahren bis heute am Gang erkennen, ob jemand Schmuggelware in den Taschen hat."

languages.text: «Supongo que la maestra de armas recordará que Belinda era la mejor tiradora de su época, y sabrá que ni mi vista ni mi pulso han mermado con el paso de los años. Serví durante cuarenta años, y a día de hoy todavía puedo adivinar si alguien lleva contrabando en los bolsillos únicamente por el modo en que camina».
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que la maestra de armas recordará que Belinda era la mejor tiradora de su época, y sabrá que ni mi vista ni mi pulso han mermado con el paso de los años. Serví durante cuarenta años, y a día de hoy todavía puedo adivinar si alguien lleva contrabando en los bolsillos únicamente por el modo en que camina».

languages.text: 「きっとマスター・アット・アームが、当時ベリンダがエンフォーサーの中で一番の射撃の名手だったことを覚えています。それに、この目と手は時間が経っても衰えていない。40年間職務に就いていたけど、今でも歩き方を見ただけでソイツがポケットに密輸品を入れているかどうか見分けられますよ」
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

traits.locale_text: 「きっとマスター・アット・アームが、当時ベリンダがエンフォーサーの中で一番の射撃の名手だったことを覚えています。それに、この目と手は時間が経っても衰えていない。40年間職務に就いていたけど、今でも歩き方を見ただけでソイツがポケットに密輸品を入れているかどうか見分けられますよ」

languages.text: “我猜应该是因为戒律大师还记得老贝琳达以前是最出色的神射手，她也清楚这么多年来，我的眼神和准头一点都没退步。我在这个岗位上干了四十年，哪怕是现在，光是看一个人走路的样子，我就能判断出那个人口袋里有没有违禁品。”
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

traits.locale_text: “我猜应该是因为戒律大师还记得老贝琳达以前是最出色的神射手，她也清楚这么多年来，我的眼神和准头一点都没退步。我在这个岗位上干了四十年，哪怕是现在，光是看一个人走路的样子，我就能判断出那个人口袋里有没有违禁品。”

languages.text: « Le capitaine d'armes doit se souvenir que Belinda n'avait pas son pareil avec un fusil parmi les prévôts. Et il sait que mon habileté n'a pas décliné au fil des ans. J'ai servi quarante années durant et, aujourd'hui encore, je peux dire si quelqu'un transporte de la contrebande dans ses poches rien qu'en observant sa démarche. »
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."

traits.locale_text: « Le capitaine d'armes doit se souvenir que Belinda n'avait pas son pareil avec un fusil parmi les prévôts. Et il sait que mon habileté n'a pas décliné au fil des ans. J'ai servi quarante années durant et, aujourd'hui encore, je peux dire si quelqu'un transporte de la contrebande dans ses poches rien qu'en observant sa démarche. »

languages.text: "Tahminimce Silahtar, Belinda'nın bir vakitler infazcılar arasındaki en iyi nişancı olduğunu hatırlıyor. Yıllar içinde gözlerimin ve ellerimin takatini kaybetmediğinin de farkında. Vazife başında kırk yıl geçirdim ve bugün bile sırf yürüyüşüne bakarak birinin cebinde yasaklı bir şey taşıyıp taşımadığını anlayabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I guess the Master-at-Arms remembers how Belinda used to be the best shot among the enforcers back in the day, and knows that my eye and hand have not diminished over the years. I spent forty years on duty, and to this day, I can tell if a man is carrying contraband in his pockets just by the way he is walking."
